title: Hybrid Learning-Based Mathematical Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (operations, functions, graphs)
context.additional_context: Flexible Educational Environments via BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) and Integrated Online/Offline Learning

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical problem-solving strategies in hybrid environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can self-directly plan learning content three or more times by combining online platforms with offline workshops
Learners can visually represent complex mathematical concepts using digital tools (graphing calculators, simulation software, etc.)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
